summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Cloverdale Street from 5th Avenue South to 8th Avenue South; by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Majority Petition No. 116054 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
